title: New Song : 'Electro' by Corla Reefer
content: Ready for the release of a song titled 'Electro' by Corla Reefer, marking our 23rd song out of our target launch goal of 1000. Thank you for your continued support along this musical journey.

title: New Rob Show
content: Rob Show #18 | My Own Grenade

title: New Music : My Own Grenade
content:
Last week we had My Own Grenade on the Rob Show and fell in love with these folks - they have generously given Ahoy permission to stream their work! We added 6 to the Mix.

For more of My Own Grenade - here is a brief about them: My Own Grenade is a Connecticut based hard rock/punk band. Founded in 1996, Tim Rooney (vocals), Mike Reid (guitar/vocals), Mike Testa (guitar), Chris Siano (bass), and Buddy Oberheim (drums) are dedicated to writing, recording, and performing original songs. My Own Grenade was voted the #2 punk band in the New Haven area in the 1999 Great Band Slam sponsored by the New Haven Advocate. After releasing our debut CD, Randal's Last Stand, we've been writing new material for our second release due out in summer 2000. Connecticut appearances have included Toad's Place and the Tune Inn (New Haven), the Webster Theater (Hartford), and Shenanigans (Norwalk). We have also played Don Hill's and The Spiral Lounge in New York City. 3 out of 4 fans report that repeated exposure to My Own Grenade increased their listening pleasure. Side effects include hot flashes, sweaty palms, and decreased dancing inhibitions. When used regularly, MOG is proven to cause a ruckus. In August 1998 and June 1999, we performed live on WRIU (90.3 FM), the University of Rhode Island radio station. In 1997, we were selected as finalists in the 'Modern Rock Wars' sponsored by WMRQ (104.1) in Hartford.

title: New Music : S.G Carlson
content: Check out the latest track 'How I Got Fat While Living Skinny' by S.G. Carlson.

title: The Rob Show - Ep 19 - Paul Wildy
content: Paul Wildy, a 20+ year cab driver in New Haven, shares his experiences from working on the Carter campaign to witnessing the city's evolution over decades.

title: The Rob Show - Ep 20 - Pat Clendenen
content: Pat Clendenen, originally from New Haven, returns after 25 years in Boston. A local lawyer and power lifter, Pat is also venturing into skateboarding.

title: New Justin Arena Songs Added
content: Dive into Justin Arena and enjoy some fresh tunes - We've added 3 new songs to the collection - 'Framework', 'Fruit In The Shower', and 'No 1'.

title: New Song: 'Moon Views, Know by Feel, Chokecherries' by The Tines
content: Introducing a new addition to our music collection - 'Moon Views, Know by Feel, Chokecherries' by The Tines.

title: The 2nd Annual Pig Roast drops July 6th
content: We base all Ahoy operations out of South Eastern New England - if you're in 100 mile radius and are a fan of ahoy come and enjoy some authentic cuban pig!

title: 2 New Rob Shows Back to Back
content: Oy oy - the Rob Show is alive and well and back with two new episodes back to back - these were the episodes Rob recorded when Alex was away in Singapore.

title: New Feature Alert - Desktop Only
content: Work in Progress but a Progress in Work - we're adding new features to the app! Please note that our latest toggle feature is currently available for desktop users only. We're focusing on perfecting the experience on larger screens before adapting it for mobile devices. Stay tuned for future updates as we continue to enhance and expand our app's capabilities across all platforms!

title: Obsolete Full Length Skate Film Out Now
content:
The Tallboyz 5th full length skate film is out now - watch it on YouTube.

Featured Skaters: Dave Gunn, Tadd Labozzetta, Josh Weaver, Ian Hutchinson, Nigel Klein, Julian Hinsch, Dave Hartnett, Mark Wojda, Don Sanders, Nick Chongo Sellen, Jay Kouch, Tyler Knight, Brad, Alec Gerhart, Matt Ragone, Brendan Brown, Eric Larson, Rob Dargiewicz, Chapi, Nick Tomanelli, Olivier De Tomas, Marcello Savona, Leon Toppin, Chuck Winfield, Aaron Kalat, Connor Murphy, Jeremy Raff, Bella Sadik, Jay O'Neill & Ed Braxton.

Watch the trailer here.

Read about them in rollernews.

title: New Feature: Ahoy Work Mode Beta
content: Unlock your peak productivity with our revolutionary new feature, Ahoy Work Mode! Designed specifically for those who thrive on focus and efficiency, this cutting-edge tool blends the soothing power of classical music with a precision-timed productivity timer. Dive into deep work sessions with our curated playlist that not only enhances concentration but also elevates your work experience. Say goodbye to distractions and hello to a world of heightened focus and outstanding results. Try Ahoy Work Mode today and transform your workday into a symphony of productivity!

title: Emerging from Construction: Exciting Updates Ahead
content: Not sure if you noticed but we've been adding  new features to the app left and right - spent the summer in construction mode - but we're almost out - and we're excited to share some new features with you soon - poke around - and enjoy.

title: The Rob Show Returns: New Episodes Every Thursday at 4pm!
content: Ahoy, listeners! The Rob Show is back with a bang for a new season! We're happy to announce our commitment to bringing you fresh episodes every Thursday at 4pm, in time to energize that final stretch of the workweek. So gather 'round the water cooler, buckle up with a beevy, and join us every week weekly dose of inspiration and insight from the one and only Rob. The Rob Show is here to make your Thursdays the highlight of your work week!

title: The Rob Show Episode 33 with Guest Rob Meglio - Listen Now!
content: Exciting news, Ahoy listeners! Today marks the release of The Rob Show Episode 33 featuring the one and only Rob Meglio. Tune in now to catch this special episode and enjoy the engaging conversation and insights. Don't miss out on this week's dose of inspiration and entertainment!

title: The Rob Show Episode 34 with Jerry Ornelas - Out Now!
content: We're back with another episode of The Rob Show! This week, Rob sits down with Jerry Ornelas for an engaging conversation you won't want to miss. Tune in now for some fresh insights and entertaining dialogue.
